selected_articles.title: Ruto: I saved Gachagua from impeachment attempts twice
selected_articles.snippet: President William Ruto has said that he took part in saving former Deputy President Rigathi Gachagua from being impeached by Members of Parliament.

selected_articles.title: Mutuse: The millionaire who has captured Ruto's heart
selected_articles.snippet: The rising profile of Mutuse, a little-known businessman from Kitui, has raised eyebrows in political circles.
